Details.External Wall Length: Sum of the perimeter of all rooms + 2 times the wall thickness of each wall segment
Details.Internal Wall Length: Sum of the lengths of walls shared between two rooms + wall thickness

Walls.Bricks or Blocks: Based on wall thickness, height, and total length
Walls.Plaster: Covers both sides of every wall
Walls.Paint: Approximate area of wall surfaces to be painted

Flooring.Materials: Sum of room areas for tiles, carpet, wood, etc.

Doors.Standard Size: 0.9m width, calculated according to openings marked in plan

Windows.Standard Size: 1.2m width, calculated according to the openings marked in plan

Construction Tasks Identification: Electrical installation (including placements for outlets and light fixtures)
Interior finishing (including plastering, painting, and installation of fixtures)
